meanings.sent1: The inexhaustibility of the water source amazed the villagers.
meanings.sent2: The inexhaustibility of her energy allowed her to work tirelessly.
meanings.sent3: The inexhaustibility of the cookie jar brought joy to the children.
meanings.sent4: His inexhaustibility in finding new ideas inspired his team.
meanings.sent5: The inexhaustibility of the sun's energy powers our planet.

meanings.definition: The state of being unable to be used up or tired out.
meanings.sent1: The inexhaustibility of the forest's resources was a blessing.
meanings.sent2: The inexhaustibility of his patience surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: The inexhaustibility of the pencil's eraser made her smile.
meanings.sent4: Her inexhaustibility in solving puzzles impressed her friends.
meanings.sent5: The inexhaustibility of his love for music was evident in his collection.
